subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: When he was an assistant coach at U.C.L.A. in 1994, Mark Gottfried watched the Bruins lose to Tulsa. Now, a 12th-seeded team ousting a No. 5 seed has become almost an annual occurrence.
snippet: When he was an assistant coach at U.C.L.A. in 1994, Mark Gottfried watched the Bruins lose to Tulsa. Now, a 12th-seeded team ousting a No. 5 seed has become almost an annual occurrence.
